subject: Soccer
Strikes
Organized Labor
Collective Bargaining
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The players’ union and the league have been negotiating the terms of a new collective bargaining agreement for weeks, but a strike could be called as early as Wednesday.
snippet: The players’ union and the league have been negotiating the terms of a new collective bargaining agreement for weeks, but a strike could be called as early as Wednesday.
